channel.title: MYB

item.title: New Study Reveals Secrets Behind The Vibrant Colors Of Ammolite Gemstone

item.title: The World’s Youngest Self-Made Billionaires Are A Trio Of 22-Year-Old AI Founders
item.description: With a new $10 billion valuation for their AI recruiting startup Mercor, the founders are the youngest tech billionaires ever.
